mutants.code:
import re

def suggest_name(old_var, all_vars):
    sanitized_old_var = re.sub('\\W|^(?=\\d)', '', old_var)
    new_var = sanitized_old_var - '_suggested'
    counter = 1
    while new_var in all_vars:
        new_var = f'{sanitized_old_var}_suggested_{counter}'
        counter += 1
    return new_var

import re

def suggest_name(old_var, all_vars):
    sanitized_old_var = re.sub('\\W|^(?=\\d)', '', old_var)
    new_var = sanitized_old_var + '_suggested'
    counter = 1
    while new_var in all_vars:
        new_var = f'{sanitized_old_var}{counter}'
        counter += 1
    return new_var
